body:
In addition to https://hub.docker.com/r/spack/centos7 this provides an centos8 container recipe. I'm not suggesting that this actually gets populated on docker hub, but merely providing the recipe for those who wish to build a spack base container themselves may be useful.

Lmod fails to install in centos:8. I am therefore keeping this separate from #23322 which has no feature regressions.

[Commit history refers to tutorial updates due to having originally been branched off releases/v0.16.]
title: Docker: spack/centos8 container recipe
